summary:
My name is Remco and I have a great passion for leading and optimizing high-impact business operations. I am an experienced all-round business leader with commercial focus and a demonstrated history of working in leading companies within the food & beverage industry.

I have a proven track record in building high-performance teams by disrupting the status-quo, building business in new geographies, identifying revenue opportunities in new channels or customers and optimizing go-to-market models while creating an inclusive culture within complex matrix organizations. 

Professionals and business partners enjoy working with me because I am a result driven, people focused manager with an international savvy mind-set. 

I possess strong negotiation skills and a great ability to present revenue growth propositions to all levels in an organization. My decisions are based on analytic insights and extensive experience across all sales fundamentals from trade marketing to category management, key account management, franchise, business development and marketing.

Skilled in Sales Management, International business expansion, Business Planning, Negotiation skills, Building High Performance Teams, Revenue Management, Brand management and Activation, Trade Marketing.

profile_positions.description:

I chair the nutrition category team with line manager responsibility for six reports. I lead large scale business transformation on go-to-market setup as project lead.
I also deliver reports to Nordic MU GM and act as a member of Nordic leadership team. I set strategic thinking around development long terms business strategy, category priorities and roles, brand positioning, destination portfolio, advertising, and promotion strategy. I establish revenue management capability and execute various strong 4P propositions based on consumer/shopper insights to drive competitive advantage. I negotiate mid- and long-term contracts with distribution partners, create aligned joint business plans and targets, and facilitate partner collaboration at GM and sales director level.

★ Established high single digit growth momentum of key focus brands.
★ Driven significant net revenue realisation by succesful execution of various commercial strategies
★ Re-defined destination portfolio and execution of brand disposals.
★ Successfully deployed go-to-market setup transformation
★ Attained strong distributor partner engagement
